long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Morningmate is a work management platform where collaborating and communicating with your teams are done with ease.

Easily turn emails into Tasks or shared insights with Morningmate Chrome Extension.

Create Tasks directly from your inbox:
- Upload emails as Tasks
- or attach emails to Tasks
- Add collaborators or assignees

Share important information directly from your inbox:
- Upload emails as Article posts or as an attachment to Articles
- Send emails via Chat

Morningmate brings your work into focus, helping teams collaborate effectively and stay organized. With its versatility and ease of use, it is designed for teams of any size, and any workflow. Get started today for free and experience the difference at [www.morningmate.com]
